channel.title: Essay on Vaibhav Kalekar
channel.description: Recent content in Essay on Vaibhav Kalekar

item.title: TUI over GUI, and we might be onto something unprecedented
item.description: Terminal User Interface, as the name suggests, is a command-line utility with a user interface for navigation. Each application boasts a keyboard-driven user interface for increased productivity and easy navigation in the app.

item.title: AI is this generation's Kryptonite
item.description: Don't let the GPT-4, 5, or the mini models overtake your life. There is a sane middle ground with newer technology, as it has been the case for decades gone by.

item.title: The World of Arch is Fun with Omarchy
item.description: Relearning to build my own systems with my preferences to love technology again.

item.title: The Perfect Future was in the Past
item.description: The world is a mess and it seems there is no way to fix it. Did we leave our perfect world behind?

item.title: The World We Live Is Devoid Of Nuances
item.description: When did we lose our ability to understand and balance our opinions in nuances?
